pkgmetadata.longdescription: Recorder is a graphical frontend of cdrecord/cdrtools, cdrdao, mkisofs and growisofs. It aims to be simple and easy to use, free of large configurations and useless options, following the KISS principle and offering a disc burning of quality, nothing more. You can burn data (CD/DVD), audio (CD), video (DVD, VCD and SVCD), iso images (CD/DVD), create iso images to burn later and check integrity of burned files with md5sum.
